title: Blueprints
summary: Blueprints are often required for crafting ships and high-tier turrets. All blueprints are single-use and are consumed upon use. Blueprints can be obtained in three ways: as faction rewards, as a loot drop from destroyed structures or ships, or from other players.
full_text:
Blueprints
Blueprints are often required for crafting ships and high-tier turrets. All blueprints are single-use and are consumed upon use. Blueprints can be obtained in three ways: as faction rewards, as a loot drop from destroyed structures or ships, or from other players.

Trivia
Hybrid Blueprints are very rare. The best way to obtain them is by killing Drone Battleships.
Pirate dens can drop faction ship blueprints.

content_structure.title: Blueprints
content_structure.content: Blueprints are often required for crafting ships and high-tier turrets. All blueprints are single-use and are consumed upon use. Blueprints can be obtained in three ways: as faction rewards, as a loot drop from destroyed structures or ships, or from other players.

sections.title: Trivia
sections.content:
Hybrid Blueprints are very rare. The best way to obtain them is by killing Drone Battleships.
Pirate dens can drop faction ship blueprints.
